oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Lactobacillus assisted synthesis of titanium nanoparticles
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: PRASAD, K
JHA, AK
KULKARNI, AR
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: bioreduction
fungus
nano titanium
nanoparticles
lactobacillus sp.
eco-friendly
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An eco-friendly lactobacillus sp. (microbe) assisted synthesis of titanium nanoparticles is reported. The synthesis is performed at room temperature. X-ray and transmission electron microscopy analyses are performed to ascertain the formation of Ti nanoparticles. Individual nanoparticles as well as a number of aggregates almost spherical in shape having a size of 40-60 nm are found.
